summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 24gameapi chat workspace. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend functionality working perfectly. Full flow tested: visitor chat → agent registration → agent login → agent dashboard → real-time messaging → file sharing.
passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Visitor chat: name input, chat initiation, message sending
Agent registration with email, password, name validation
Agent dashboard: session list, filtering, search functionality
Real-time messaging between visitor and agent
Theme toggle working on all pages (light/dark mode)
Responsive UI design and professional appearance
